COMMENT: This was a tricky one. I don't believe there's an useful way to quantisize knowledge. So instead I thought about how comfortable I feel using these languages/techs/methologies. Look at it as an "Been there, done that". Of course, I've just included what I considered relevant, so if not listed just ask!
TABS.LABEL: Category
SKILLTABLE.HIGH.TITLE: I'm very confortable with...
SKILLTABLE.HIGH.SUBTITLE: A skill that I've used constantly during a long period of time.
SKILLTABLE.MEDIUM.TITLE: I'm confortable with...
SKILLTABLE.MEDIUM.SUBTITLE: A skill that I've used a lot, but not recently or with enough depth
SKILLTABLE.LOW.TITLE: I've used...
SKILLTABLE.LOW.SUBTITLE: A skill that I've used at some point for a short period of time.
